name: The Neko Family The Game (chapter 1) (discord novel)
name_original: The Neko Family The Game (chapter 1) (discord novel)
description:
Follow how a leader of a discord server as he works trough and control a server, but in this base we take the discord server on a whole new level we bring it to life, and pretend the discord community is a real group of people in real life and while they go trough hardship, drama, romance, betrayel etc

this game is mostly based on true things that have happen in the server.

more info coming soon (p.s this is the most copyrighted game probly)
